hidden_abilites: Quickly moves (dashes) to first target and quickly engages in battle.
Upon first appearing, casts a barrier that defends against 99% of damage for a period of time.
Increases splash damage of regular attack, and during skill attacks, becomes immune to stun
description.skill2: Increase movement speed of elf unit in PvP (0.4%, 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.6%, 2%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Ent ]
